topic: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories

ideas.title: Nana's Nautical Nightmares
ideas.premise: A grandchild envisions Nana's saltwater tales as hilariously exaggerated, monstrous versions of everyday Port Phillip Bay creatures.
ideas.why_funny: Turns boring stories into a ridiculous, kaiju-style Melbourne monster mash.

ideas.title: The Great Saltwater Secret Santa
ideas.premise: Nana misinterprets 'saltwater stories' as instructions for a bizarre Secret Santa with ocean-themed, slightly offensive gifts.
ideas.why_funny: Clash between sweet Nana and inappropriate ocean-themed gifts from St Kilda pier.

ideas.title: Bogan Baywatch
ideas.premise: Nana casts herself and her grandkids as bogan lifesavers patrolling a very unglamorous Altona Beach.
ideas.why_funny: The juxtaposition of glamourous Baywatch and a realistic, suburban Aussie beach.

ideas.title: Seagull Shenanigans
ideas.premise: A grandchild imagines Nana's stories being re-enacted by hyper-realistic, opinionated Melbourne seagulls.
ideas.why_funny: Seagulls are already funny; giving them Nana's stories is comedy gold.

ideas.title: The Fairy Bread Armada
ideas.premise: Nana recounts her youth sailing a 'fairy bread armada' on the Werribee River, fighting for lolly supremacy.
ideas.why_funny: Absurdity of a nautical battle fought with incredibly sweet, daggy Aussie treats.

news_title: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories
